content: us size g-6/4 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* us size h-8/5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* us size i-9/5 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* small amounts of fiber filling stitch markers yarn needle **gauge** *exact gauge for smallest hook us size g-6/4 mm is not critical for this pattern stitches should be small so fiber filling doesn t show * 5 scbl = 1 25 3 cm across with medium hook us size h-8/5 mm *for best fit always check your gauge * 11 double_crochet = 4 10 cm across with largest hook us size i-9/5 5 mm *for best fit always check your gauge * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/30/7-christmas-in-july-make-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/07/01/crochet-polar-bear-hat-pattern-stocking-cap-in-10-sizes/ 3 https //tidd ly/4l2mxea
